description: Alexander Straus happens upon businessman Slavo Jaworsky.  All it takes for Alexander to get an an invitation into Slavo's private cabin is to show off that monster that he has in his jeans.  Once inside, Slavo sucks that dick like it should be.  That's not enough for Alexander though, he needs to fuck Slavo and Slavo doesn't mind at all.
title: Pleasure Express, Scene #02
